net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database

Class SQLiteColumnInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.SQLiteColumnInfo

  • public class SQLiteColumnInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains information returned by the table_info pragma in SQLite.
    Since:
    zerobandwidth-net/android 0.1.4 (#26)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean bNotNull
      Indicates whether the column is defined NOT NULL.
      boolean bPrimaryKey
      Indicates whether the column is the table's primary key.
      int nColumnID
      The numeric ID of the column in any given row.
      java.lang.String sColumnName
      The name of the column in the table definition.
      java.lang.String sColumnType
      The magic SQLite token indicating this column's data type.
      java.lang.String sDefault
      The default value of the column, as a string.
      java.lang.String sTableName
      The name of the table containing this column.

      SQLiteColumnInfo()

      Gathers information about the columns in the specified table, and returns the column descriptions in a map.

    • Method Detail

      • gatherColumnList

        public static java.util.List<SQLiteColumnInfo> gatherColumnList(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                                                java.lang.String sTableName)
        Gathers information about the columns in the specified table, and returns the column descriptions in a list.
        Parameters:
        db - the database to be analyzed
        sTableName - the name of the table to be analyzed
        Returns:
        a list of objects describing the columns of the table
        See Also:
        SQLitePortal.getColumnListForTable(java.lang.String)

      • gatherColumnMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SQLiteColumnInfo> gatherColumnMap(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                                                               java.lang.String sTableName)
        Gathers information about the columns in the specified table, and returns the column descriptions in a map.
        Parameters:
        db - the database to be analyzed
        sTableName - the name of the table to be analyzed
        Returns:
        a map of column names to objects describing those columns
        See Also:
        SQLitePortal.getColumnMapForTable(java.lang.String)
